name: AI Voice Platform
description: Embeddable persona platform - custom AI chatbots with voice, memory, and multi-provider LLM support
goals: Persona system with templates and full customization

milestones.name: Phase 1: Quick Polish
milestones.details: Voice cloning UI, usage tracking, memory panel

milestones.name: Phase 2: Foundation (Auth + DB)
milestones.details: Supabase auth, database schema, usage tracking, login/signup pages

milestones.name: Phase 3: Embeddable Widget
milestones.details: Widget loader, iframe chat app, embed dashboard, origin validation, rate limiting

milestones.name: Phase 3.1: Demo & Testing
milestones.details: Demo widget (no Supabase), test-widget page, iframe focus management with postMessage

milestones.name: Phase 4: Stripe Billing
milestones.details: Stripe SDK, checkout flow, webhooks, billing portal, subscriptions table, billing UI with pricing cards

milestones.name: Phase 4.1: Voice Cloning UX
milestones.details: Unconfigured state UI, voice cloning guide, sample scripts, in-browser audio recorder, recording tab in clone dialog, post-clone persona prompt, voice selection in persona editor

milestones.name: Phase 4.2: Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA)
milestones.details: ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, color contrast fixes, semantic HTML, screen reader support

notes: Voice Cloning UX complete! Added unconfigured state UI, educational guide, sample scripts, in-browser audio recorder with waveform visualization, and post-clone persona creation flow. Also completed WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility improvements. Next: Phase 5 - Twitter/social bot integration.
